entities.name: hepzibah
entities.description: Hepzibah is a person who has something to show Tom. She mentions that she has never shown Mr Burke this thing and wants to keep it a secret.

entities.name: tom
entities.description: Tom is a person who is being asked by Hepzibah to keep a secret. He agrees to see what Hepzibah has to show him.

entities.name: hokey
entities.description: Hokey is a person who brings out something for Hepzibah to show Tom.

entities.name: mr burke
entities.description: Mr Burke is someone that Hepzibah mentions she doesn't want to sell her secret item to. She also says she has never shown him this thing before.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a person who speaks quietly and agrees to see what Hepzibah has to show him.

entities.name: mr riddle
entities.description: Mr Riddle is someone that Hepzibah mentions as the owner of something she wants Hokey to bring out for Tom to see.

relationships.description: Hepzibah asks Tom to keep a secret and show him something she has never shown Mr Burke before.
Hokey brings out an item for Hepzibah to show Tom.
Voldemort agrees to see what Hepzibah has to show him, indicating that he is willing to keep a secret like Tom.
